channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- PowerPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- PowerPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24123|2024-08-03T19:21:18.642Z -- unknown -- powerpress
item.description: Arbitrary file upload in the PowerPress WordPress plugin, versions before 8.3.8, did not verify some of the uploaded feed images (such as the ones from Podcast Artwork section), allowing high privilege accounts (admin+) being able to upload arbitrary files, such as php, leading to RCE.
